Name: Pixel Ship Shooter
About the game: Pixel Ship Shooter is a fast-paced retro shooter game, dodge bullets and zap your friends to death! Features * Retro-style gameplay * Up to 4 player multiplayer * LAN and global online hosting * State-of-the-art graphics and visuals * Power-ups * Colorful explosions Controls * WASD and arrow keys for movement * Space to shoot * R to respawn * Esc to enter main menu * F11 to toggle full screen Hosting * Unblock ports 7777 and 27015 in TCP and UDP * Unblock game in the Firewall * Enter main menu * Click 'Host match' Joining * Unblock game in the Firewall * Enter main menu * For LAN use local IP in text bar (example 192.168.0.1) * For Internet use global IP * Press Enter and then 'Connect'
